name: Peepa
description: $PEEPA is an ERC-20 meme coin inspired by the popular PEPE meme, designed to bring back the excitement and community spirit of memecoins. Launched without a presale to ensure fairness, $PEEPA features no taxes, with liquidity pool tokens burned and the contract renounced, making it fully community-owned. With a total supply of 420,690,000,000,000 tokens, $PEEPA aims to foster a vibrant community through its unique and playful nature. The project emphasizes its lack of intrinsic value or financial expectations, existing purely for entertainment.
